Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed with exceptional quality and functionality in mind. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. For a limited time, I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $95. This is a special opportunity to acquire a high-value item at a reasonable cost. Please let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
